data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 2, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a Benevento throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
In Parma Parma Calcio attack through Maxime Busi. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Parma.
In the minute 4, Gianluca Lapadula gets his shot on target but fails to score for Benevento.
Throw-in Benevento.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
In the minute 5, Parma Calcio are coming forward and Maxime Busi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
Can Parma Calcio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benevento's half?
In the minute 6, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Benevento have a goal kick.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Benevento at Ennio Tardini.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, In Parma a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Juan Luca Sacchi awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Gervinho for Parma Calcio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 15, Benevento have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 17, Hernani (Parma Calcio) gets a yellow card.
Goal kick for Benevento at Ennio Tardini.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 22, Free kick Parma Calcio.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Parma Calcio in Parma.
In the minute 25, Benevento are whistled for offside.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Parma Calcio's Jasmin Kurtic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Benevento defender.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Parma Calcio's Andreas Cornelius attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
In the minute 30, Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Benevento in the half of Parma Calcio.
Benevento have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 32, Juan Luca Sacchi awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Artur Ionita for Benevento has been booked by Juan Luca Sacchi and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
Juan Luca Sacchi awards the away team a throw-in.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the home team in Parma.
Benevento to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 40, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Benevento's half.
Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
Free kick for Benevento in the half of Parma Calcio.
In the minute 44, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Parma Calcio just outside Benevento's area.
Yordan Osorio (Parma Calcio) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Benevento at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 45, Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway at Ennio Tardini.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Benevento.
In the minute 46, Fabio Liverani is making the team's first substitution at Ennio Tardini with Juan Brunetta replacing Yann Karamoh.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Benevento.
Matteo Scozzarella (Parma Calcio) has received a first yellow card.
Benevento's Gianluca Caprari gets in a shot on goal at Ennio Tardini. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Benevento.
Parma Calcio needs to be cautious. Benevento have an attacking throw-in.
Riccardo Improta of Benevento smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 52, Benevento have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
Benevento drive upfield and Kamil Glik gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Parma Calcio defender.
Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, In Parma a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in the half of Benevento.
In the minute 57, Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
Can Parma Calcio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benevento's half?
Free kick Parma Calcio.
In the minute 58, Benevento's Federico Barba has been booked in Parma.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 60, Juan Luca Sacchi awards Benevento a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Juan Luca Sacchi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, Throw-in Parma Calcio.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marco Sau is on a sub for Gianluca Caprari for Benevento.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
In the minute 72, Juan Brunetta is booked for the home team.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Matteo Scozzarella for Parma Calcio who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Benevento in the half of Parma Calcio.
Matteo Scozzarella (Parma Calcio) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Gaston Brugman.
In the minute 76, Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
Parma Calcio's Juan Brunetta looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 76, Juan Luca Sacchi awards the home team a throw-in.
Juan Luca Sacchi waits before resuming play because Juan Brunetta for Parma Calcio is still down.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Parma.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Benevento at Ennio Tardini.
Benevento's Roberto Insigne breaks free at Ennio Tardini. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
In the minute 80, Play has been interrupted briefly in Parma to check on Alessandro Tuia, who is grimacing with pain.
Daam Foulon (Benevento) has replaced the possibly injured Alessandro Tuia at Ennio Tardini.
The away team replace Roberto Insigne with Andres Tello.
In the minute 82, Throw-in Benevento.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
At Ennio Tardini, Riccardo Improta has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 87, Benevento will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Parma Calcio.
Benevento make their fourth substitution with Bryan Dabo replacing Riccardo Improta.
Giuseppe Di Serio is replacing Gianluca Lapadula for the away team.
In the minute 88, The home team have replaced Andreas Cornelius with Roberto Inglese. This is the third substitution made today by Fabio Liverani.
Parma Calcio make their fourth substitution with Riccardo Gagliolo replacing Maxime Busi.
Hernani (Parma Calcio) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 89, Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
Jasmin Kurtic (Parma Calcio) has received a yellow card from Juan Luca Sacchi.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Benevento close to the penalty box.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Benevento!
Benevento's Federico Barba is whistled for offside at Ennio Tardini.
Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in the half of Benevento.
Parma Calcio surge into the attack at Ennio Tardini but Hernani’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Benevento at Ennio Tardini.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Parma. The final score is 0-0.
Andres Tello (Benevento) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
